titleStmt.title: St. Edwards ghost: or, Anti-Normanisme: being a patheticall complaint and motion in the behalfe of our English nation against her grand (yet neglected) grievance, Normanisme.
titleStmt.author: Hare, John, 17th cent.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Richard Wodenothe at the Starre under Peters Church in Cornhill.,

notesStmt.note: By John Hare, who has signed "Ad lectorem", and whose initials appear at the end of text.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Starre under Peters Church in Cornhill.
